alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:08PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Fremont County through 345 PM MDT... At 307 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Red Canyon, which is also 20 miles south of Lander, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, penny size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Fremont County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Wind River Mountains East
